DOC.brief_summary: To estimate effect omeprazole pharmacokinetics nelfinavir healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Estimate The Effect Of Omeprazole On The Pharmacokinetics Of Nelfinavir In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 55 year . Subjects hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease .
